# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview

This is a Ground News clone frontend built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The project is a news aggregation platform that displays articles from multiple sources without bias indicators.

## Key Features

- News article aggregation from multiple sources
- Category filtering (Politics, Technology, Sports, etc.)
- Search functionality
- Source filtering
- Article bookmarking and sharing
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Clean, modern UI similar to Ground News

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **State Management**: React hooks and context
- **Data**: Mock data for articles, sources, and categories

## Code Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow React and Next.js best practices
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Implement responsive design principles
- Create reusable components
- Use proper TypeScript types and interfaces
- Follow clean code principles
- Ensure accessibility compliance

## Component Structure

- Create reusable UI components in `/src/components`
- Use proper TypeScript interfaces for all props
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Follow atomic design principles when possible

## Mock Data

- Create realistic mock data for articles, sources, and categories
- Include proper metadata like publication dates, author names, etc.
- Ensure data structure supports all required features
